us of the concept of transpar in the design of
hierarch structur system thi paper deal with the design of
hierarch structur program system it develop a method for evalu
the cost of requir programm to work with an abstract
of a real machin a number of exampl from hardwar
and softwar ar given as illustr of the method cacm

bottom up design level of abstract synchron primit 4 20
